name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】桃鈴ねね x 星街すいせい x 常闇トワ　Christmas Live【 #ねねすいトワクリスマスライブ 】 [VVQQcI6r3NU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Introduction and scene transition for the next performance.
Performance of the song 'Haiiro to Ao' (Gray and Blue) by Tokoyami Towa and Hoshimachi Suisei.

subtitles.original: 灰色と青
subtitles.english: Gray and Blue

subtitles.original: 袖丈が覚束ない夏の終わり
subtitles.english: The end of summer, with sleeves too long

subtitles.original: 明け方の電車に揺られて思い出した
subtitles.english: Remembered while swaying on a dawn train

subtitles.original: 懐かしいあの風景
subtitles.english: That nostalgic scenery

subtitles.original: たくさんの遠回りを繰り返して
subtitles.english: After taking many detours

subtitles.original: 同じような街並みがただ通り過ぎた
subtitles.english: Similar cityscapes just passed by

subtitles.original: 窓に僕が映ってる
subtitles.english: I'm reflected in the window

subtitles.original: 君は今もあの頃みたいにいるのだろうか
subtitles.english: I wonder if you're still like you were back then

subtitles.original: ひしゃげて曲がったあの自転車で走り回った
subtitles.english: Riding around on that dented and bent bicycle

subtitles.original: 馬鹿々々しい綱渡り 膝に滲んだ血
subtitles.english: A foolish tightrope walk, blood seeping on knees

subtitles.original: 今はなんだかひどく虚しい
subtitles.english: Now, somehow, it feels terribly empty

subtitles.original: どれだけ背丈が変わろうとも
subtitles.english: No matter how much our heights change

subtitles.original: 変わらない何かが ありますように
subtitles.english: I hope something remains unchanged

subtitles.original: くだらない面影に励まされ
subtitles.english: Encouraged by a trivial image

subtitles.original: 今も歌う 今も歌う 今も歌う
subtitles.english: I still sing, I still sing, I still sing

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: せわしなく街を走るタクシーに
subtitles.english: In a taxi racing busily through the city

subtitles.original: ぼんやりと背負われたまま くしゃみをした
subtitles.english: Sneezed while being carried along absent-mindedly

subtitles.original: 窓の外を眺める
subtitles.english: Looking out the window

subtitles.original: 心から震えたあの瞬間に
subtitles.english: At that moment when my heart truly trembled

subtitles.original: もう一度出会えたらいいと強く思う
subtitles.english: I strongly hope we can meet once again

subtitles.original: 忘れることはないんだ
subtitles.english: I will never forget it

subtitles.original: 君は今もあの頃みたいにいるのだろうか
subtitles.english: I wonder if you're still like you were back then

subtitles.original: 靴片方 茂みに落として探し回った
subtitles.english: Lost one shoe in the bushes and searched around

subtitles.original: 何があろうと僕らはきっとうまくいくと
subtitles.english: Thinking we'd surely be fine no matter what

subtitles.original: 無邪気に笑えた日々を覚えている
subtitles.english: I remember those days when we laughed innocently

subtitles.original: どれだけ無様に傷つこうとも
subtitles.english: No matter how wretchedly we get hurt

subtitles.original: 終わらない毎日を 花束に
subtitles.english: Turning the never-ending days into a bouquet

subtitles.original: くだらない面影を追いかけて
subtitles.english: Chasing after a trivial image

subtitles.original: 今も歌う 今も歌う 今も歌う
subtitles.english: I still sing, I still sing, I still sing

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 朝日が昇る前の欠けた月を
subtitles.english: The waning moon before the sun rises—

subtitles.original: 君もどこかで見ているかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you're watching it too somewhere

subtitles.original: 何故かわけもないのに胸が痛くて
subtitles.english: For some reason, my chest hurts for no cause

subtitles.original: 滲む顔 かすむ色
subtitles.english: A blurring face, a hazy color

subtitles.original: 今更 悲しいと叫ぶには
subtitles.english: To shout about sadness after all this time—

subtitles.original: あまりに全てが遅すぎたかな
subtitles.english: Perhaps everything was far too late

subtitles.original: もう一度初めから歩けるなら
subtitles.english: If I could start walking from the beginning again

subtitles.original: すれ違うように君に会いたい
subtitles.english: I'd want to meet you as if passing by

subtitles.original: どれだけ背丈が変わろうとも
subtitles.english: No matter how much our heights change

subtitles.original: 変わらない何かが ありますように
subtitles.english: I hope something remains unchanged

subtitles.original: くだらない面影に励まされ
subtitles.english: Encouraged by a trivial image

subtitles.original: 今も歌う 今も歌う 今も歌う
subtitles.english: I still sing, I still sing, I still sing
